docs.title: 🏢 Company Profiles Overview
docs.text: Browse detailed profiles of popular 10★ companies — including perks, working stat requirements, and special features.

docs.title: 🔎 Available Profiles
docs.text:
• 🚜 Farm — Income + Gym perks
  • 🎵 Music Store — Passive profit scaling
  • 🍣 Restaurant — Manual-heavy profit perks
  • 📺 TV Station — Low-effort daily income
  • 🪑 Furniture Store — Popular early-game option
  • 🧪 Software Corp — Training with passive flair
  • 🔧 Mechanic — Balanced perks, often undervalued
  • 🍭 Sweet Shop — Hidden gym bonus potential
  • 🎮 Game Dev — Niche but powerful with right stats

Want a dynamic comparison table or visual tier list added here? I can generate that and embed it too. Just say the word!

docs.title: Torn Assistant: Decision Flow
docs.text:
Welcome! This is your starting point to figure out what kind of company fits your goals, playstyle, and budget.

Just answer a few questions and we’ll guide you to the right path.

docs.title: What's Your Main Goal?
docs.text:
Choose one to get started:

  • 💰 I want to earn money
  • 🏋️ I want to gain stats
  • 🎯 I want perks, passives, or strategy
  • 💬 I want to work with friends or RP

docs.title: Not Sure What a Job Special Is?
docs.text:
Most companies offer Job Specials — permanent perks you unlock by working long enough.

🧠 Learn more in the Job Special Guide

docs.title: Already Know What You Want?
docs.text:
Jump to quick resources:

  • 📂 All Companies A–Z
  • 🗺️ Compare by Goal
  • 🧾 How to Earn Money for a Company

docs.title: Budget Advice

docs.title: 💼 Torn Company Recommender: Based on Working Stats + Goals
docs.text: Looking for a company that complements your grind style, perks focus, and working stats? This Q&A flow will recommend two top-tier companies — with reasons why they’re a strong fit for you.

docs.title: 1️⃣ Working Stats — Enter your values
docs.text:
Paste from your profile or type manually:

  • Manual:
  • Intelligence:
  • Endurance:

We’ll use your highest stat (or combo) to match you to companies where you can unlock full perks and get promoted efficiently.

docs.title: 2️⃣ Why are you joining a company?
docs.text:
Choose one:

  • 🌱 Passive income over time
  • 🏋️ Stat growth from job perks
  • 💼 Unique perks (travel, stealth, refills)
  • 🧠 Leadership potential / future ownership

docs.title: 3️⃣ What kind of perks matter most?
docs.text:
Pick your top priority:

  • 🏋️ Training boosts (e.g. Gym, Sports)
  • 💊 Drug/Energy savings (e.g. Cruise, Medical)
  • 🔫 Combat bonuses (e.g. Law, Tech)
  • 🎧 Pure income (e.g. Music, TV, Farm)
  • ✈️ Travel utility (e.g. Cruise, Oil Rig)

docs.title: 4️⃣ How active are you?
docs.text:
• ⚔️ Very active — chaining, busting, training
  • 💼 Daily logins and grinding
  • 😴 Casual — perks matter more than performance

docs.title: 5️⃣ Are you aiming to climb the ranks?
docs.text:
• 🧗 Yes — I want promotions and growth
  • 💰 No — I just want the best perks
  • 🧪 Depends on the company

docs.title: 🏢 Final Recommendation Output
docs.text: Based on your stats and choices, here’s what you might see:

docs.title: ✅ 1. 10★ Cruise Line
docs.text:
• Your Manual and Endurance meet the required thresholds
  • Perks: drug and energy efficiency + travel time reduction
  • Great for active grinders or frequent travelers
  • Easy to stay maxed on perks with balanced stats

docs.title: ✅ 2. 10★ Tech Company
docs.text:
• Requires strong Intelligence and Manual
  • Perks: boosts to weapon power, accuracy, and stealth
  • Ideal for chaining, PvP, or players with strong gear
  • Promotion ladder is short and fast with the right stats

💡 Tip: To unlock full perks, most 10★ companies need ~1,500–2,000 in your highest relevant stat. Farm and Music rely on Manual, Law favors Intelligence, and Sports needs Endurance.

Want a script or in-chat assistant to calculate all this for you? I’ve got one ready whenever you want to plug it in. 🔌📘

docs.title: 🧰 Torn Assistant: Utilities
docs.text: Need a quick fix or diagnostic tool? This section houses all the behind-the-scenes helpers to keep your docs clean and functional.

docs.title: 🧪 Maintenance & Validation
docs.text:
• 🔍 Link Checker — Detects broken Markdown links
  • 🧼 Nav Cleanup — Removes unused or outdated entries
  • 📐 Nav Optimizer — Auto-sorts and balances nav sections

Looking to automate your project hygiene? These scripts are your maintenance crew. 🧹🔧
